item.description:
Hello all - how does rodizio sound? I just bought a Groupon for Spettu's Steakhouse in Quincy. I am only doing this meet up for 6 people however if someone else buys a groupon we can make this event larger (that would require a different tab/table) or if people just want to pay cash that's obviously an option as well. Please do not hesitate to give feedback for this idea. I will ask that they people who do RSVP bring $5 in cash to compensate me for the Groupon that I bought. Additionally Groupons do NOT cover alcoholic drinks or gratuity so if you plan on drinking please come prepared - cash is always ideal to keep paying the bill easier for the waitstaff.

Please contact me with any questions.
item.how_to_find_us: I will send out my cell #

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: $5 Dinner - Rodizio at Spettu's Steakhouse - Beat this price!
